page.title: 12OPENCAST MINING IN RIPLEY
page.content: People are worried about the fact that there is going to be an opencast coal mine in this area.The area at the moment has fields with flowers and birds in.The people know that this will be ruined because around the pit there woll be thirty foot mounds of earth and the dust will make the cars, walls,washing etc dirty.It would also mean that nobody could play on the fields and people would have to take their dogs for a walk somewhere else. All of the plant life and the wildlife will have to go,along with all the public footpaths of which there are 13.People are trying to stop them from going ahead with the opencast.So far they have written to the Prime Minister for help,and made badges,posters and stickers.They are trying very hard,to stop the mining.
